Welcome to the Organicco family. Have a nice shopping.

The subject of this Agreement is to determine the terms and conditions for the member to benefit from Organicoo, which is owned by Organicoo. The member undertakes that all personal access and contact information submitted while subscribing to the Organicoo application is correct, and that he will fully and immediately cover the damages that may occur due to incorrect information. Organicoo cannot give the user name and password to anyone, the right to use the said password belongs only to the member. Therefore, Organicoo’s all kinds of compensations arising from such unauthorized use against claims and accusations made by third parties against Organicoo. and other requests are reserved. This agreement will remain in effect until the member cancels his/her membership or the membership is canceled by Organicoo. Membership registration means that the member has read all the articles in the membership agreement and accepted the articles in the membership agreement. This Agreement was concluded at the time of the member’s membership and entered into force mutually.

Due to its favorable climate and geographical features,Turkey is among the countries preffered by organic product producers. With the increasing interest in organic products every year, the growing sector brings many natural products from various categories to its customers, thanks to this application.We aim to raise organic generations by taking the gift of nature from the fertile lands in every corner of our country and delivering it to you and your homies. With the Organicoo, we deliver our products to your table with freshness and nutrical values of the field.We aim to raise organic generations by taking the gift of nature from the fertile lands in every corner of our country and delivering it to you and your homies.
